resources.string: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry\'s standard dummy text ever since the 1500s,
You didn’t mark the place of your car yet. Please when you done parking, mark the car place on the map and we’ll save it for you
We did save the place of your car you can safely leave the area
Don\'t worry your parking spot has been saved. Now directing you to that spot...
Current location permission denied. See this FAQ with information about why we need this permission. Please, grant us access on the Settings screen.
Your current location is important for this app. Please grant the permission.
